column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////When I knew I was going to visit Chicago
column2: the only thing I really wanted to do was get good deep dish pizza. I was Lou Malnati's was the place to go
column3: so we went on my first night there. We got two orders of pizza
column4: cheese and pepperoni. Both tasted like magic and happiness. I liked both a lot
column5: but I have to say the pepperoni was better since I like my pizza with more than cheese. The crust was also buttery which made it all the better.
